tagId.description: Unique identifier for a given Tag.

externaldatav1AddressFormat.title:
- ADDRESS_FORMAT_UNCOMPRESSED: 04<X_COORDINATE><Y_COORDINATE>
 - ADDRESS_FORMAT_COMPRESSED: 02 or 03, followed by the X coordinate
 - ADDRESS_FORMAT_ETHEREUM: Your standard Ethereum address (0x...). We apply EIP55 casing.
 - ADDRESS_FORMAT_BITCOIN_P2PKH: Bitcoin formats. See https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/List_of_address_prefixes

externaldatav1Curve.description: Cryptographic Curve used to generate a given Private Key.

subject.description: The resource being referenced within a policy (e.g., user.tags or activities.type).

targets.description: The specific parameter from the subject being referenced, like a specific user ID.

immutableactivityv1AddressFormat.title:
- ADDRESS_FORMAT_UNCOMPRESSED: 04<X_COORDINATE><Y_COORDINATE>
 - ADDRESS_FORMAT_COMPRESSED: 02 or 03, followed by the X coordinate
 - ADDRESS_FORMAT_ETHEREUM: Your standard Ethereum address (0x...). We apply EIP55 casing.
 - ADDRESS_FORMAT_BITCOIN_P2PKH: Bitcoin formats. See https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/List_of_address_prefixes

immutableactivityv1Curve.description: Cryptographic Curve used to generate a given Private Key.

immutableactivityv1TransactionType.title: - TRANSACTION_TYPE_ETHEREUM: Unsigned Ethereum transaction, RLP-encoded and hex-encoded

v1HashFunction.description:
- HASH_FUNCTION_UNSPECIFIED: Default value if hash function is not set explicitly
 - HASH_FUNCTION_NO_OP: No-op function. Useful if you want to pass raw bytes to sign
 - HASH_FUNCTION_SHA256: Standard SHA-256
 - HASH_FUNCTION_KECCAK256: Keccak-256 (not the same as NIST SHA-3!).
This is the hash function used in the Ethereum ecosystem.

v1Intent.description: Intent object crafted by Turnkey based on the user request, used to assess the permissibility of an action.

invitationId.description: Unique identifier for a given Invitation object.

receiverUserName.description: The name of the intended Invitation recipient.

receiverEmail.description: The email address of the intended Invitation recipient.

receiverUserTags.description: A list of tags assigned to the Invitation recipient.

senderUserId.description: Unique identifier for the Sender of an Invitation.

receiverUserName.description: The name of the intended Invitation recipient.
receiverUserName.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,max=40"

receiverUserEmail.description: The email address of the intended Invitation recipient.
receiverUserEmail.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,email"

receiverUserTags.description: A list of tags assigned to the Invitation recipient.
receiverUserTags.title: @inject_tag: validate:"dive,uuid"

senderUserId.description: Unique identifier for the Sender of an Invitation.
senderUserId.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,uuid"

v1OrganizationData.description:
This proto definition is used in our external-facing APIs.
It's important to leverage annotations because they're used in our external interfaces.

v1PayloadEncoding.title:
- PAYLOAD_ENCODING_UNSPECIFIED: Default value if payload encoding is not set explicitly
 - PAYLOAD_ENCODING_HEXADECIMAL: Payload is encoded in hexadecimal
We accept 0x-prefixed or non-0x prefixed payloads.
We accept any casing (uppercase, lowercase, or mixed)
 - PAYLOAD_ENCODING_TEXT_UTF8: Payload is encoded as utf-8 text
Will be converted to bytes for signature with Rust's standard String.as_bytes()

policyId.description: Unique identifier for a given Policy.

selectors.description: A list of simple functions each including a subject, target and boolean. See Policy Engine Language section for additional details.

notes.description: Human-readable notes added by a User to describe a particular policy.

consensus.description: A consensus expression that evalutes to true or false.

condition.description: A condition expression that evalutes to true or false.

privateKeyId.description: Unique identifier for a given Private Key.

publicKey.description: The public component of a cryptographic key pair used to sign messages and transactions.

privateKeyName.description: Human-readable name for a Private Key.

addresses.description: Derived cryptocurrency addresses for a given Private Key.

privateKeyTags.description: A list of Private Key Tag IDs.

privateKeyName.description: Human-readable name for a Private Key.
privateKeyName.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,max=40"

privateKeyTags.description: A list of Private Key Tag IDs.
privateKeyTags.title: @inject_tag: validate:"dive,uuid"

addressFormats.description: Cryptocurrency-specific formats for a derived address (e.g., Ethereum).
addressFormats.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required"

fingerprint.description: An artifact verifying a User's action.
fingerprint.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required"

number.description: The account number of the customer's credit card.
number.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,max=16,numeric"

cvv.description: The verification digits of the customer's credit card.
cvv.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,max=4,numeric"

expiryMonth.description: The month that the credit card expires.
expiryMonth.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,numeric,len=2"

expiryYear.description: The year that the credit card expires.
expiryYear.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,numeric,len=4"

cardHolderEmail.description: The email that will receive invoices for the credit card.
cardHolderEmail.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,email"

cardHolderName.description: The name associated with the credit card.
cardHolderName.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,max=40"

lastFour.description: The last four digits of the credit card added.

cardHolderName.description: The name associated with the payment method.

cardHolderEmail.description: The email address associated with the payment method.

privateKeyId.description: Unique identifier for a given Private Key.
privateKeyId.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,uuid"

payload.description: Raw unsigned payload to be signed.
payload.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required"

timestampMs.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) of the request, used to verify liveness of user requests.

organizationId.description: Unique identifier for a given Organization.

privateKeyId.description: Unique identifier for a given Private Key.
privateKeyId.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required,uuid"

unsignedTransaction.description: Raw unsigned transaction to be signed by a particular Private Key.
unsignedTransaction.title: @inject_tag: validate:"required"

timestampMs.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) of the request, used to verify liveness of user requests.

organizationId.description: Unique identifier for a given Organization.

userId.description: Unique identifier for a given User.

userEmail.title: some users do not have emails (programmatic users)

apiKeys.description: A list of API Key parameters.

userTags.description: A list of User Tag IDs.

apiKeys.description: A list of API Key parameters.
apiKeys.title: @inject_tag: validate:"dive,uuid"

userTags.description: A list of User Tag IDs.
userTags.title: @inject_tag: validate:"dive,uuid"

id.description: Unique identifier for a given Vote object.

userId.description: Unique identifier for a given User.

activityId.description: Unique identifier for a given Activity object.

message.description: The raw message being signed within a Vote.

publicKey.description: The public component of a cryptographic key pair used to sign messages and transactions.

signature.description: The signature applied to a particular vote.

scheme.description: Method used to produce a signature.

v1Vote.description: Object representing a particular User's approval or rejection of a Consensus request, including all relevant metadata.
